boardgame.name: Neanderthal
Neanderthal: Lovci mamutů
尼安德特人
boardgame.description: It's 43,000 BC in Ice Age Europe, the dawn of modern man. In Neanderthal, you are one of three human species: Archaic, Neanderthal, or Cro-Magnon. Assign your males to hunt Pleistocene megafauna, but try to avoid being eaten by predators. Assign your women for teaching your children vocabulary, leading to cognitive fluidity in the next generation and to a tribalistic culture. Specialize your elders for fire, war, big game, inventions, or animal domestications. Choose between three mating strategies: promiscuous, harems, or pair bonding. Victory depends on which strategy you choose, and may include your hunters, elders, women, vocabulary, trophies, inventions, or domesticated animals._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At this point, the players have developed to the point where the companion game Greenland begins, so you can flow one game into another seamlessly._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2015 Golden Geek Best Solo Board Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Above and Below _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Games That Killed Other Games
Episode 70- Mombasa and Buonocore Hot Seat
Episode 90 -- The Secret Life and Death of a Bowhead Whale
The Good, The Board and The Little’ns: Episode 63 “Raising Gamers”

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Game: Neanderthal (Sierra Madre Games) Condition: new in shrinkwrap Language: English Thanks in advance for ordering! See below for information on shipping, payment _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; cancellation. Payment: Bank transfer to an EU bank account using IBAN/BIC in advance (normally free of charge if your bank account is nominated in EURO) Paypal (add 3,- Euro to cover the fees. That should be the first choice for non-EU customers.) Pick up the game at my game store (no shipping cost) Shipping: always insured and with tracking Germany: 5,99€ for the first item card games or smaller boxes might be cheaper (please contact me beforehand) EU: 13,99€ up to 2kg 15,99€ up to 5kg 20,99€ up to 10kg Rest of the world: Please contact me before purchasing an item to clarify the shipping costs. I can offer discounts on shipping if multiple marketplace purchases are made. Returns and Cancellation: You may cancel your order without giving any reasons within 14 days after placing your order. Please contact spieleberatung@t-online.de and I will attempt to resolve the matter. Unopened copies of the game that are no longer wanted can be returned, but there is a 10% restocking fee payable of the item price and the buyer is responsible for the return shipping costs. Spieleberatung Frank Solnitzky Hainbuchenweg 1 36381 Schlüchtern Germany +49-06661-9115039 spieleberatung@t-online.de

If you have any questions please ask and thanks for looking!

Sierra Madre Games (SRM34) It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s 43,000 BC in Ice Age Europe. You are one of three human species - Archaic, Neanderthal, or Cro-Magnon. Assign your males to hunt Pleistocene megafauna, but try to avoid being eaten by predators. Assign your women for teaching your children vocabulary, leading to cognitive fluidity in the next generation. Specialize your elders for fire, inventions, war, big game, or animal domestications. Choose between three mating strategies - promiscuous, harems, or pair bonding.

Sierra Madre Games (SRM34) It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s 43,000 BC in Ice Age Europe. You are one of three human species - Archaic, Neanderthal, or Cro-Magnon. Assign your males to hunt Pleistocene megafauna, but try to avoid being eaten by predators. Assign your women for teaching your children vocabulary, leading to cognitive fluidity in the next generation. Specialize your elders for fire, inventions, war, big game, or animal domestications. Choose between three mating strategies - promiscuous, harems, or pair bonding.
Box and all components in perfect condition.

A kind of prequel to Greenland, this is another brutal struggle for survival. This time it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s tribes of proto-humans mixing it with each other and the Pleistocene megafauna. Hunting and gathering keeps your tribe alive while you try to develop a full culture. Brilliant. The price shown is for UK/EU purchasers (and includes VAT). For purchasers outside the EU, the price is £18.33 (net of UK tax) - note that the purchaser is responsible for paying any duty or tax due on import to their country. I charge shipping at cost, as follows. UK addresses: £3.13 (myHermes, takes 3 working days, tracked) Other EU countries: £8.22 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Europe outside the EU: £6.85 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) Australasia: £11.15 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked) USA, Canada _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; elsewhere: £10.30 (Air mail, takes 1 week or so, not tracked)
